name: WoofWars
description:
WoofWars is a competitive action and strategy game.  Where you will have to master different mechanics and create different strategies to paint most of the map and be the most playful puppy in the family.

Important aspects:
  • Need two gamepads
  • Local multiplayer
  • Only for Windows, Mac and Linux
